message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll take advantage of it!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, based on my research and budget, I am only able to consider offers within the range of $15000 or less. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still very confident in the value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $17000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it!
